titleStmt.title: Mr. Smirke; or, The divine in mode: being certain annotations upon the animadversions on The naked truth : together with a short historical essay, concerning general councils, creeds, and impositions, in matters of religion / by Andreas Rivetus, Junior, anagr. Res Nuda Veritas.
titleStmt.author: Marvell, Andrew, 1621-1678.

titleStmt.title: Mr. Smirke; or, The divine in mode: being certain annotations upon the animadversions on The naked truth : together with a short historical essay, concerning general councils, creeds, and impositions, in matters of religion / by Andreas Rivetus, Junior, anagr. Res Nuda Veritas.
titleStmt.author: Marvell, Andrew, 1621-1678.

notesStmt.note: In defence of The naked truth, by Herbert Croft, Bishop of Hereford, from the attacks of Francis Turner, Bishop of Ely, in his Animadversions upon a late pamphlet entituled The naked truth.
Written by A. Marvell. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Place of publication from NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
